title: Ep 132: Places of Vulnerability with Meredith Talusan
itunes:title: Ep 132: Places of Vulnerability with Meredith Talusan
itunes:subtitle: Kate gets a (masked, outdoors) haircut and Doree’s eyebrows are out of control, plus they discuss how to take care of maskne. Then they’re joined by Meredith Talusan (author of Fairest: A Memoir). She talks about bodywork and the Feldenkrais Method as ...
description:
Kate gets a (masked, outdoors) haircut and Doree’s eyebrows are out of control, plus they discuss how to take care of maskne. Then they’re joined by Meredith Talusan (author of Fairest: A Memoir). She talks about bodywork and the Feldenkrais Method as self-care, how her relationship with makeup changed after transitioning, and what it was like growing up as a child star in the Philippines.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Please take our listener survey!
